channel.title: Project Death Metal development team
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i87.photobucket.com/albums/k134/ace_mage99/projectdeathmetal.gif[/img]
[b]There are rules on this thread and on this Team
1. No Flamming if you do so you will be reported strait to The Un-Named or bobdole81 2. do not spam this topic 3. there will be no adult content used on this thread or on the forums there are young members on moparscape even if you think there isnt.. 4. all spots are taken seriously if you dont think you can do it.. dont apply 5. i WILL need proof of your skills on the position you are applying for[/b]
This project will go through and it will release a server! even if i have to do it on my own... i probably will though xD we will be using My banditz pk source..
[u]Project Staff[/u]
~~Website/Game Staff~~ -Owner(s) I Metal I -Admins In Game cumescape, ~3D PK3R~ -Mods (none)
~~Coders~~ -4 spots- (i will assist the coders if needed)
~~Client Coders~~ -2 spots-
~~Website Design~~ - I Metal I - Empty
~~Banner Creator(s)~~ -I Metal I -Stupinator -Empty (we will bounce ideas for banners off of eachother)
~~Tester(s)~~ -spots open-
~~Hoster~~ (must be no-ip atleast 20/7) -Hamachi - open -No-Ip - open (these two will be chosen you can apply but theres less of a chance of reciving this spot)
[b]Use This Layout When Applying:[/b]
[code]First Name: Name on the forums: Position Applying For: Proof of your Skills: Reason I Should Choose You: Anymore Information i need to know:[/code]
~!<>!~I Metal I~!<>!~

and.pm.me.if.you.need.anything.in.the.graphics.department

Position Applying For:banner-creator
Proof of your Skills:






Reason I Should Choose You:…its.in.the.proof
i.made.all.those.and.more.
Anymore Information i need to know:i.can.handle.criticism.as.long.as.it.is.constructive.i.do.not.enjoy.being.insulted
and.i.will.try.my.hardest.to.do.exactly.what.you.want.for.your.banner[/quote]

Accepted welcome to the team =][br][size=1]Posted on: June 02, 2007, 05:12:48 PM[/size][hr][quote="~3D PK3R~, post:11, topic:104862"]First Name: Luke
Name on the forums: duno yet
Position Applying For: admin
Proof of your Skills: alot , metal, you know me
Reason I Should Choose You: cuz im Kewl, make awesome tuts and have an awesome server
Anymore Information i need to know: You know all about me ;)[/quote]
i dont know all about you but i know a bit make me sound like your lover pfft youll be mod too you have to pr0ve thyself to me O.o lolz
